43060.name: Total wealth per capita
43060.description: Total wealth is calculated by summing up each component of wealth (“bottom-up approach”): Natural capital + Produced capital + Human capital + Net foreign assets. (See each of the individual variables for further detail)
43060.datasetName: Wealth per capita by component by country - World Bank (2017)

source.name: World Bank (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: WB calculations based on various sources
